channel.title: IATI standard website- short downtime on Wednesday 7th of November
channel.description:
Users will not be able to access iatistandard.org and reference.iatistandard.org from 8am (BST) on Wednesday 7th of November 2018. This is due to a server upgrade and following backup restore. We expect these operations to take 1/1.5 hours.
During this time, users will still be able to publish and access data via the [IATI Registry](https://iatiregistry.org/).
If you have any questions, please email support@iatistandard.org.
